eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: TopDownMovementAnimator
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Change the animation according to the movement direction.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description: Change the animation according to the movement direction.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Change the animation according to the movement direction.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: TopDownMovementAnimator

eventsFunctions.description: Update the animation according to the object direction.
eventsFunctions.name: UpdateAnimation

eventsFunctions.description: the animation name of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: AnimationName

events.comment: Also update the animation direction to avoid to play the animation in an old direction for 1 frame.

eventsFunctions.description: Check if animations are paused when objects stop.
eventsFunctions.name: IsPausingAnimation
eventsFunctions.sentence: _PARAM0_ animations are paused when objects stop

eventsFunctions.description: Change whether animations are paused when objects stop.
eventsFunctions.name: SetIsPausingAnimation

eventsFunctions.description: Check if animations are scaled according to speed.
eventsFunctions.name: IsScalingAnimation
eventsFunctions.sentence: _PARAM0_ animations are scaled according to speed

eventsFunctions.description: Change whether animations are scaled according to speed or not.
eventsFunctions.name: SetIsScalingAnimation
eventsFunctions.sentence: Scale animations of _PARAM0_ according to speed: _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Change the animation speed scale according to the object speed.
eventsFunctions.name: UpdateAnimationSpeedScale
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the animation speed scale according to _PARAM0_ speed

eventsFunctions.description: Pause the animation according to the object speed.
eventsFunctions.name: UpdateAnimationPause
eventsFunctions.sentence: Pause the animation according to _PARAM0_ speed

parameters: mod(mod(Direction - OtherDirection, DirectionCount) + DirectionCount / 2, DirectionCount) - DirectionCount / 2

eventsFunctions.description: Update the animation direction of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: UpdateAnimationDirection

events.comment: Change the animation but keep the current frame number.
Use a small margin is used to avoid to flicker between 2 directions.
Allow to use the same animation for any direction.

propertyDescriptors.label: Animation name
propertyDescriptors.description: Animations must be called "Walk0", "Walk1"... for left, down...
propertyDescriptors.name: AnimationName

propertyDescriptors.label: Number of directions
propertyDescriptors.description: Leave to 0 to automatically use 8 when diagonals are allowed and 4 otherwise.
propertyDescriptors.name: DirectionCount

propertyDescriptors.label: Angle offset
propertyDescriptors.description: Set to 90, "Walk0" becomes the animation for down.
propertyDescriptors.name: AngleOffset
